EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_CF Summit GE_Q316.Invite 9-1-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Get 20% Off Your Cloud Foundry Summit Europe Ticket
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/about/?summitId=11993]]> On September 26, hundreds of developers and operators will gather in Frankfurt for three days of education, development, and community at Cloud Foundry Summit. Learn how Cloud Foundry has enabled robust, resilient and flexible cloud native applications across multiple cloud platforms. Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/about/?summitId=11993]]>, held on September 26-28, 2016 in Frankfurt, is where the world’s most influential organizations will meet to define their multi-cloud strategies.
Don’t be left behind—the event is on-track to sell out so register now <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/about/?summitId=11993]]> and get 20% off with Pivotal sponsor code CFEU16PIV20!
Fidelity International Associate Director Emma Hammond
Rakuten PaaS Developer Ronak Banka
Dutch Government Agency Rijkswaterstaat’s Bas van Essen
Additional keynote speakers include Allianz’s Dr. Andreas Nolte, SAP’s Marc Geall, Senior Vice President, Head of Platform Partner Ecosystem, GCO, Pivotal CEO Rob Mee, Engineer Better CTO Daniel Jones, Kichwa Coders’ founder Tracy Miranda, EMC CTO John Roese, a team of Volkswagen representatives, and more. Check out the full schedule <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/ram-schedule-2--summitId-11993/3gsgly/732437156]]>.
Why you should attend?
- Access to 75+ breakout sessions, lightning talks, and keynotes - Discover how to manage and take containers into production at scale - Learn how to run applications across multiple clouds - Meet BOSH, the powerful orchestration tool that lies at the heart of Cloud Foundry - Intro to the latest incubation projects and learn more about the Cloud Foundry ecosystem - Get training on development of microservices in a continuous delivery environment—from coding to production
Need to convince your boss? Download and customize your letter <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/ince-your-boss--summitId-11993/3gsglw/732437156]]>.
Save 20% off the ticket price with Pivotal sponsor code CFEU16PIV20.
Register Here <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/about/?summitId=11993]]>
See you there! The Pivotal Team
